Summary Sales and Marketing Manager: specialist with an international network and broad experience in IT industry. Special focus on Retail, CE, OEM, Multinational PC vendors, Online and Distribution channels. 
 
Proven track-record on building and managing new business and teams, with focus on performance enablement and results. 
 
As a person: 
Proactive, takes ownership and can make quick (data driven) business decisions. 
Can translate long term strategic goals into short term tactical team deliverables. 
Energetic, problem solver, structured and able to quickly adopt to (organizational) changes. Experience Retail Marketing Manager & Market Development Manager Intel Corporation November 2009  – Present (5 years 10 months) Netherlands -Development of retail eco system, with focus on several multinational PC vendors and key retail & online partners in the Northern European Region.  
 
-Managing the team of retail sales representatives in the Netherlands. With the task to increase the advocacy for selling Intel based PC’s and other Intel products and services in retail. 
 
-Development of the retail sales and marketing strategy for Notebooks, Tablets and Desktops in the region. Aim is to accelerate new product introduction, drive sales and create awareness in the B2B and B2C market. 
 
-Actively involved in joint (retail) activation programs with key industry partners to introduce new product categories and usage model based solutions. Distribution Business Manager Intel Corporation December 2007  –  November 2009  (2 years) BeNeLux Responsible for the development and implementation of the BeNeLux distribution strategy. 
 
Driving all distribution programs, sales and marketing initiatives, target setting, budget planning and performance management within the distributor network. Managing sales of all Intel boxed products: CPU, Motherboard, Server products, Mobile, LAN and SSD. 
 
Managing the top channel customers in the region.
